content:
"What did I say? Delicious, isn't it?" Seilo slides the empty tray into the last box, pauses for a moment, then leans in. "Now if you think this was good, let me tell you somethin'… There's a tree grows just north of here. Unlike anything I ever seen before. Found it a few months back. Whole train of little buzzers lead me to it. Was hiding in a little nook in the Philosopher's Garden."

His voice drops to a whisper. "The flowers were almost chameleon-like, shiftin' colors with the rise and fall of the sun. I can't help but wonder what kind of honey those little buzzers are cooking up out there. If you wanna make history with me, I'll let you tag along … "

A) Agree to help. Discard all  , and attach the HELPING HAND mission to Seilo.

B) Not today. Discard Seilo. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
